item.title: Web Component Icons
item.description: body { --pfe-icon--Color: var(--pbp-fg-color, white); } @media (min-width: 750px) { #TableOfContents { float: right; padding: 10px; /* margin: 10px; */ margin: 0 0 20px 20px; background-color: #242424; } } This is the story of <pfe-icon>. I set out to build a web component which loads icons on demand, displays them with customizable colors, avoids CORS issues, and is compatible with any existing SVG icon library.
